titles.title: SF18 Be still and know that I am God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God.
Be still and know that I am God.
Be still and know that I am God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am the Lord that healeth thee.
I am the Lord that healeth thee.
I am the Lord that healeth thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In Thee, O Lord, I put my trust.
In Thee, O Lord, I put my trust.
In Thee, O Lord, I put my trust.
